Retrieves all the user profiles belonging to the authenticated user. If the authenticated is a white label or agency administrator, then all users belonging to the white label will be returned. 

====URL:====
http://sendible.com/api/v1/profile.format

====Formats:====
xml, json

====HTTP Methods:====
GET

====Authentication:====
Basic authentication with username and password or <a href="http://sendible.com/api">api key</a> belonging to the Sendible user.

====Success Response:====
{{{
<users type="array"> 
  <user> 
    <api-key>xxxx</api-key> 
    <email>user@sendible.com</email> 
    <fullname>Admin</fullname> 
    <id type="integer">1</id> 
    <login>username</login> 
    <is-pro type="boolean">true</is-pro> 
    <account-type-name>Marketer</account-type-name> 
    <total-credits-available type="decimal">2222.0</total-credits-available> 
  </user> 
</users> 
}}}

====Error Response:====
{{{
<error>
<type>InvalidUsernamePassword</type>
<message>Username/password is invalid.</message>
</error>
}}}
